snippet: Gunmen have seized Chibok, forcing thousands of people to flee the town where the group Boko Haram kidnapped nearly 300 schoolgirls in April, a local official said Friday.
abstract: Gunmen seize Chibok, Nigeria, forcing thousands of people to flee town from which Boko Haram kidnapped nearly 300 schoolgirls in April.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen have seized Chibok, forcing thousands of people to flee the town where the group Boko Haram kidnapped nearly 300 schoolgirls in April, a local official said Friday.

headline.main: Nigeria: Gunmen Take Town Where Girls Were Seized
headline.print_headline: Nigeria: Gunmen Take Town Where Girls Were Seized
